project_purpose: To create a skill-based exchange network that promotes equal access to economic participation, allowing users to exchange services either via direct skill-swap or community credits.
notes: This is a prototype build - non-functional requirements (security, scalability, performance) are deferred.
Focus is on core functional workflows and user interactions.
Target organization: Malaysian Ministry of Human Resources (MOHR) or community development organizations.

actors.name: User
actors.description: General registered user of the platform

actors.name: Administrator
actors.description: Platform administrator with moderation and analytics access

actors.name: System
actors.description: Automated system processes (e.g., matching, fraud detection)

modules.description: Allows users to showcase expertise and discover others.

features.title: Populate Profile Details
features.precondition: User is logged into the system
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'My Profile' > Enters name, bio, and uploads profile picture > Clicks 'Save' > System reloads and displays updated profile page.
features.postcondition: Profile information is saved and displayed publicly
acceptance_criteria: User can edit name, bio, and profile picture
Changes are persisted after save
Updated profile is visible to other users

features.title: Manage Skills
features.precondition: User is logged in and has a profile
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'Edit Profile' > Inputs skill (e.g., 'Python') > Selects expertise level (e.g., 'Beginner', 'Intermediate', 'Expert') > Clicks 'Add Skill' > System records skill and displays it on public profile.
features.postcondition: Skill is added to user's profile and visible to others
acceptance_criteria: User can add multiple skills
Each skill has an expertise level
Skills can be edited or removed
Skills are displayed on public profile

features.title: Manage Portfolio
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'Edit Portfolio' > Clicks 'Upload', 'Edit', or 'Delete' for portfolio items (images/docs) > Clicks 'Save' > System updates portfolio display.
features.postcondition: Portfolio items are updated and visible on profile
acceptance_criteria: User can upload images and documents
User can edit portfolio item details
User can delete portfolio items
Portfolio is visible on public profile

features.title: Manage Service Listings
features.precondition: User is logged in and has at least one skill
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'My Services' > Clicks 'Add Service' > Fills in service title, description, and preferred exchange mode (credits or direct swap) > System saves service listing.
features.postcondition: Service listing is created and visible to other users
acceptance_criteria: User can create service listings
Each listing has title, description, and exchange mode
User can edit or delete own listings
Listings are searchable by other users

features.title: View Others Profile
features.process_flow: User clicks on another user's name/link > System loads profile > System displays bio, skills, portfolio, service listings, and reputation metrics.
features.postcondition: Other user's profile information is displayed
acceptance_criteria: User can view any public profile
Profile displays bio, skills, portfolio
Profile displays service listings
Profile displays reputation ratings

features.title: Manage External Links
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'External Links' section > Pastes valid URL (e.g., LinkedIn, GitHub) > System validates and saves link > System displays it as a clickable icon.
features.postcondition: External link is added to profile
acceptance_criteria: User can add external links
System validates URL format
Links are displayed as clickable icons
User can remove links

modules.description: Enables users to post service requests and be automatically matched with relevant skill providers.

features.title: Posting Service Request
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'Posting Request' > Fills details: title, description, skill needed, exchange mode > System stores request and lists it under active requests.
features.postcondition: Service request is created and visible in the system
acceptance_criteria: User can create a service request
Request includes title, description, required skill
User can select exchange mode (credit or skill swap)
Request appears in active requests list

features.title: Edit or Delete Own Request
features.precondition: User has created a service request
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'My Requests' > Clicks 'Edit' or 'Delete' > System updates record or removes request > System refreshes list.
features.postcondition: Request is updated or removed from the system
acceptance_criteria: User can edit own requests
User can delete own requests
Changes are reflected immediately
Cannot edit/delete others' requests

features.title: View Posted Requests
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'Browse Requests' > System displays list of active requests with requester name, required skill, and description.
features.postcondition: User can see all active service requests
acceptance_criteria: User can browse all active requests
Requests show requester info, skill needed, description
Requests can be filtered or searched
User can click to view request details

features.title: Skill Matching (Automated)
features.precondition: A new service request is posted
features.process_flow: Trigger: New request posted > System compares required skills with user database > System identifies matching providers > System displays suggested users to the Requester.
features.postcondition: Matching service providers are suggested to the requester
acceptance_criteria: System automatically finds matching providers
Matches are based on skill relevance
Suggested providers are displayed to requester
System can find multiple potential matches

features.title: Accept or Reject Suggested User
features.process_flow: System shows suggested users > User reviews profiles > User clicks 'Accept' or 'Reject' > System updates request status and notifies selected user.
features.postcondition: Provider is selected or requester can request more suggestions
acceptance_criteria: User can view suggested provider profiles
User can accept a suggested provider
User can reject and request other suggestions
Accepted provider receives notification

features.title: Report Inappropriate Request
features.precondition: User is viewing a service request
features.process_flow: User views request > Clicks 'Report' > States reason > System records report and notifies Admin.
features.postcondition: Report is submitted and added to admin review queue
acceptance_criteria: User can report any request
Report requires a reason
Report is sent to admin queue
Reporter receives confirmation

features.title: Monitor Reported Requests
features.precondition: Admin is logged in and reports exist
features.process_flow: Admin accesses 'Request Management' panel > Reviews report details > Chooses 'Approve' (keep), 'Remove' (delete request), or 'Dismiss' (ignore report) > System executes action.
features.postcondition: Reported request is handled appropriately
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view all reported requests
Admin can see report reason and request details
Admin can remove violating requests
Admin can dismiss invalid reports

modules.description: Supports both direct skill-to-skill exchanges and credit-based transactions.

features.title: Request Skill-Based Transaction
features.precondition: User has found a service provider
features.process_flow: Requester finds provider > Proposes skill exchange > Specifies skill offered in return > System notifies provider > Provider accepts or negotiates > System confirms exchange.
features.postcondition: Skill-based transaction is initiated between both parties
acceptance_criteria: Requester can propose skill-for-skill exchange
Provider receives notification of proposal
Provider can accept, reject, or counter-propose
Both parties must agree before transaction starts

features.title: Request Credit-Based Transaction
features.process_flow: Requester selects credit mode > System checks balance > System reserves credits upon confirmation > System transfers credits to provider upon completion.
features.postcondition: Credits are transferred from requester to provider
acceptance_criteria: Requester can select credit-based exchange
System validates sufficient balance
Credits are reserved during transaction
Credits transfer on successful completion

features.title: Track Credit Balance and History
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'Credit History' > System displays current balance, transaction records, and statuses.
features.postcondition: User can view their credit information
acceptance_criteria: User can view current credit balance
User can see transaction history
History shows credits earned and spent
Each transaction shows status and details

features.title: Earn Credits Through Service Delivery
features.process_flow: Exchange marked 'Completed' by both parties > Requester confirms success > System adds credits to Provider's account > System records transaction.
features.postcondition: Provider receives credits for completed service
acceptance_criteria: Credits are awarded after service completion
Both parties must confirm completion
Credits are added to provider balance
Transaction is recorded in history

features.title: Report Disputed Transactions
features.process_flow: User goes to transaction history > Selects 'Report Dispute' on a transaction > Describes issue and attaches evidence > System forwards to Admin.
features.postcondition: Dispute is submitted for admin review
acceptance_criteria: User can dispute any transaction they're part of
Dispute requires description of issue
User can attach evidence (screenshots, etc.)
Dispute is sent to admin queue

features.title: Manage Disputed Transactions
features.process_flow: Admin reviews evidence from both parties > Admin adjusts or reverses transaction if needed > System notifies both users of resolution.
features.postcondition: Dispute is resolved and users are notified
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view all disputes
Admin can see evidence from both parties
Admin can adjust or reverse transactions
Both parties receive resolution notification

features.title: Flexible Exchange Negotiation
features.process_flow: User opens negotiation page > Proposes terms (duration, credit amount, scope) > Both users must confirm agreement > System proceeds to transaction.
features.postcondition: Terms are agreed upon by both parties
acceptance_criteria: Users can propose custom terms
Terms can include duration and amount
Both parties must accept final terms
Agreement is recorded before service begins

modules.description: Establishes trust via ratings, reviews, and skill endorsements.

features.title: Rate Service Provider
features.precondition: Service exchange is marked as completed
features.process_flow: Service marked 'Completed' > User navigates to 'Completed Services' > Clicks 'Leave Feedback' > Inputs rating (1-5 stars) and comment > System saves feedback.
features.postcondition: Rating and review are saved and visible on provider's profile
acceptance_criteria: User can rate provider after completion
Rating uses 1-5 star scale
User can add written comment
Rating appears on provider's profile

features.title: Endorse Service Provider's Skill
features.precondition: User has given a rating to the provider
features.process_flow: After rating given > System shows checkbox with skill from original request > User checks box to endorse > System records endorsement on Provider's skill.
features.postcondition: Skill endorsement is added to provider's profile
acceptance_criteria: User can endorse specific skill after rating
Endorsement is linked to the relevant skill
Endorsement count shows on provider's skills
Endorsement is optional

features.title: Rate Service Requester
features.precondition: Service exchange is marked as completed
features.process_flow: Service marked 'Completed' > Provider navigates to 'Completed Services' > Clicks 'Rate Requester' > Inputs rating and comment > System saves feedback.
features.postcondition: Requester's reputation score is updated
acceptance_criteria: Provider can rate requester after completion
Rating uses 1-5 star scale
Provider can add written comment
Rating affects requester's reputation

features.title: Respond to Feedback
features.precondition: User has received feedback on their profile
features.process_flow: User views feedback on own profile > Clicks 'Reply' > Types response > System displays reply publicly below original feedback.
features.postcondition: Response is visible alongside the original feedback
acceptance_criteria: Provider can respond to any feedback received
Response appears below original feedback
Response is publicly visible
Only one response per feedback allowed

features.title: View User Reputation
features.process_flow: User views a profile > System calculates and displays two aggregates: 'Provider Rating' (average as provider) and 'Requester Rating' (average as requester).
features.postcondition: Reputation metrics are displayed
acceptance_criteria: Profile shows provider rating average
Profile shows requester rating average
Ratings are calculated from all feedback
Number of ratings is also displayed

features.title: Report Inappropriate Feedback
features.precondition: User has received feedback they believe is inappropriate
features.process_flow: User views 'Reviews About Me' > Clicks 'Report' on a review > Provides reason > System flags review > System adds to Admin moderation queue.
features.postcondition: Feedback is flagged for admin review
acceptance_criteria: User can report feedback about themselves
Report requires a reason
Flagged feedback is sent to admin queue
Feedback remains visible until admin decision

features.title: Review Reported Feedback
features.process_flow: Admin logs in > Clicks 'Reported Feedback' queue > Views review text and reporter reason > Decides action (Delete/Dismiss) > System updates review status.
features.postcondition: Reported feedback is handled appropriately
acceptance_criteria: Admin can view all reported feedback
Admin can see original feedback and report reason
Admin can delete inappropriate feedback
Admin can dismiss invalid reports

modules.description: Tools to monitor platform health, engagement, and prevent fraud.

features.title: View System Overview
features.process_flow: Admin opens 'System Overview' > System calculates and displays stats/charts: Total Users, Active Requests, Completed Exchanges, Total Credit Flow.
features.postcondition: Admin can see platform-wide statistics
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows total registered users
Dashboard shows number of active requests
Dashboard shows completed exchanges count
Dashboard shows credit circulation stats

features.title: Monitor Module Analytics
features.process_flow: Admin selects a module (e.g., Transaction System) > System displays usage stats, activity trends, and any error logs.
features.postcondition: Admin can see module-specific analytics
acceptance_criteria: Admin can select any system module
Analytics show usage statistics
Analytics show activity trends over time
Error logs are accessible if any

features.title: Detect Abnormal Credit Activity
features.process_flow: System monitors transactions > Detects abnormal patterns (unusual volume, repeated transfers between same users) > Flags transaction > Sends alert to Administrator.
features.postcondition: Suspicious activity is flagged for admin review
acceptance_criteria: System automatically monitors transactions
System detects unusual patterns
Suspicious transactions are flagged
Admin receives alerts for flagged items

features.title: View Personal Contribution Analytics
features.process_flow: User opens 'My Analytics' > System displays charts: Completed exchanges, Credits earned/used, Overall performance rating.
features.postcondition: User can see their personal statistics
acceptance_criteria: User can view their completed exchanges
User can see credits earned and spent
User can see their overall rating
Analytics are presented visually (charts)

features.title: View Request Activity Insights
features.process_flow: User opens 'My Requests Analytics' > System displays: Total requests made, Requests completed, Average response time, Credits used.
features.postcondition: User can see their request activity summary
acceptance_criteria: User can see total requests made
User can see completion rate
User can see average response time
User can see total credits spent

features.title: Compare My Activity with Community Average
features.process_flow: User selects time range and/or skill category > System displays comparison chart of User's Activity vs Community Average.
features.postcondition: User can benchmark their activity against community
acceptance_criteria: User can select time range for comparison
User can filter by skill category
Chart shows user vs community average
Comparison includes key metrics

features.title: Track Skill Growth and Service History
features.process_flow: User navigates to 'Service History' > System lists all completed services, dates, skills used, and feedback received.
features.postcondition: User can review their service history and skill progression
acceptance_criteria: User can see list of completed services
Each entry shows date and skill used
Each entry shows feedback received
User can track skill usage over time
